description:
Update Capture Page Design and Typography

Redesign the Capture page to improve visual hierarchy, readability, and responsive layout while updating shared components for consistency.

Requirements:
- Remove border styling from the capture form container
- Increase font size for entry/input fields to improve readability (target 16-18px base)
- Implement responsive width constraints:
  - Desktop: wider container with maximum width constraint
  - Tablet: full-width layout with edge-to-edge content
  - Mobile: full-width layout with minimal margins
- Update shared components (buttons, inputs, labels) to match new borderless design language
- Ensure consistent spacing and visual alignment across all viewport sizes
- Maintain accessible color contrast and touch target sizes (minimum 44px for mobile)
title: Capture refresh
